features.name: Resource Hub
features.description: Homepage experience displaying dynamic school resources with search, category filters, and click tracking integrated with backend APIs.

features.name: Activity News & Announcements
features.description: Public-facing activity news listings backed by Prisma queries and admin-managed announcements with RSVP capabilities.

features.name: Training Library
features.description: Multi-format training resources (video, text, file) with category filters, difficulty levels, and admin CRUD endpoints.

features.name: Admin Resource Management
features.description: Admin dashboard for managing resource catalog, including CRUD operations and category assignments.

features.name: Article CMS
features.description: Full article publishing workflow with drafts, publishing, and public article rendering via slug routes.

features.name: Authentication & Authorization
features.description: Username-based NextAuth setup with role enforcement, permission middleware, and protected admin pages.

features.name: Notification System
features.description: User notification APIs and real-time client updates with hooks and UI banner integration.

features.name: System Settings & Maintenance
features.description: Database-backed settings service powering maintenance mode, admin configuration panels, and public fallback UI.

features.name: Dashboard & Team Management
features.description: Internal dashboard widgets covering tasks, calendar, and team info with corresponding APIs and hooks.
